entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump But the U.S. is not, despite what the President says or suggests, the number one county in terms of testing on a per capita basis.

In fact, on coronavirus testing per capita, the U.S. ranks a dismal 38th.
